text: That is what I meant by my second message but I looked through your code and it looks correct to me.

So your issue seems to be a bit different then mine so I setup something similar using your code and it seems there is a possible bug or at least no consistency. This right here (I believe) is your problem

One time this occurred and started doing exactly has you described. So I went in and removed the object count and refreshed and the cards reappeared. I was even able to change it back to 1 and worked fine. Let me know if that works. If that doesn't try creating a new page and adding it.
Here is after I changed the min to 0 and refreshing.
